channel.title: Daisuke Nishihama (西濱大将)
channel.description: Recent content on Daisuke Nishihama (西濱大将)

item.title: How To Enable Android USB Tethering On M1 Mac
item.description: Introduction # At some point, Macs quit supporting USB tethering. WiFi tethering is faster than Bluetooth tethering, but it drains the battery. This was a significant bottleneck. I still wanted to use USB tethering, so I lowered the security level of my Mac and attempted to build my own build for my environment to support USB tethering.

item.title: Award
item.description: Aug 2021 Saitama University Student Commendation Award

item.title: CV
item.description: Jun 2000: Born in Soka City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. Aug 2014: Supervised the Japanese language of Bluemail, a mailer application for Android (Retired in Jan 2017) Mar 2019: Graduated from Kasukabe Kyoei High School 2020 # Apr 2020: Entered Department of Physics, Faculty of Science, Saitama University May 2020: Joined Akatoki1 and CORE2 Oct 2020: Conducted a combustion test of his own rocket engine “LIATRIS.

item.title: Presentation
item.description: Uncovering the relationship between ozone and radiation―ANCO-Project (2022.11) Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA)(ISAS) Balloon Symposium FY 2022 (November 7-8, 2022. Hybrid event (JAXA Sagamihara Campus & online)) (external link/JAXA ) Very useful “Python course” for science students - Saitama University (2023.

item.title: Welcome to ddd3hLab
item.description: Purpose of this site # ddd3hLab is a website established to record and summarize my own research and development of what I, Daisuke Nishihama, am interested in on a daily basis, and to occasionally publish my ramblings.
